charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1101_010:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw
Samson Oak talking to Blue.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_030:
Blue was just showing me his Exeggutor from
the Kanto region.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_040: If you have time, are you down for a chat?
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_050: Awesome! That’s what I wanted to hear!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_060:
I’m actually a cousin of Blue’s grandfather,
Samuel Oak.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_070:
We’re both researchers, so even though
we’re far from one another—in Kanto and
Alola—we’ve always kept in touch.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_080:
If Gramps lived on a tropical island, I bet
his whole look would be just like yours!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_100:
Our appearances can change, influenced by
where we live...
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_120:
I caught my partner Exeggutor in the Alola
region as part of my research on regional
variants.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_130:
When you compare Blue’s Exeggutor to mine,
you can see how different they are, right?
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_140:
Those differences were caused by the strong
sunlight of the Alola region awakening the
power hidden within...or so they say!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_150:
The most obvious difference between
my Exeggutor and the Exeggutor in Kanto
is his long, thin neck!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_160:
He can swing that distinctive neck of his
like a whip and smack his opponents!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_170:
This Exeggutor is what the people of Alola
are familiar with. They say this is how
Exeggutor ought to look.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_180:
Whenever I think of an Exeggutor, this form
here is what comes to mind...
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_190:
So, when I first saw an Alolan Exeggutor, I
couldn’t believe it was the same Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_200:
What people consider common knowledge
can really depend on where they grew up.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_210:
Which Exeggutor do you like more,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_0401_230: Right? I thought you’d say that!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_0401_240: I figured you’d see it my way!
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_0402_260:
Oho! Are you also interested in
regional variants?
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_280:
but the Exeggutor in Kanto and Alola both
look just as they should.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_290: They’re exactly as they are meant to be.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_300:
You shouldn’t reject something just because
you don’t know much about it.
charaepi_ch0138_00_orchid2/2301_1201_310:
That’s why it’s important to accept and
embrace the culture and perspectives of
other regions!
